name: CABasicAnimation
desc: An object that provides basic, single-keyframe animation capabilities for a layer property.

items.name: var fromValue: Any?
items.desc: Defines the value the receiver uses to start interpolation.

items.name: var toValue: Any?
items.desc: Defines the value the receiver uses to end interpolation.

items.name: var byValue: Any?
items.desc: Defines the value the receiver uses to perform relative interpolation.
